summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Grand Boulevard from 29th Avenue West to a fourth 100 feet west of 38th Avenue W. et al in the City of Seattle, by constructing watermains under Ordinance No. 26828, creating Local Improvement District No. 2478 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
